summary: This bill, the "District of Columbia National Guard Home Rule Act," aims to grant the Mayor of the District of Columbia the same authority over the D.C. National Guard that state governors have over their respective National Guards. It amends various sections of U.S. Code to replace references to the President and the Commanding General of the D.C. National Guard with the Mayor, giving the Mayor command authority, especially concerning administration, responding to disasters, and other emergencies. This bill also includes conforming amendments.
